description: This file defines a module for generating a Statement of Work (SOW) document in DOCX format using the 'docx' library. It contains functions for constructing various sections of the document, such as headers, footers, parameter tables, deliverables, milestones, authorization signatures, and the overall assembly of the document. It also includes utility functions for formatting data and images, and exports methods to build the document blob and generate filenames.

methods.name: dataUrlToBytes(dataUrl)
methods.description: Converts a data URL representing an image into a Uint8Array of bytes.

methods.name: cleanValue(v)
methods.description: Removes placeholder underscores and trims whitespace/artifacts from input values.

methods.name: formatValue(v)
methods.description: Formats various types of data into string representations suitable for document insertion.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a nested property value from an object using a dot-separated path with a fallback.

methods.name: buildTopIntro({ meta = {}, templateData = {} })
methods.description: Creates the introductory title, subtitle, and paragraph sections for the document.

methods.name: buildParametersTable({ templateData = {} })
methods.description: Constructs a table with key work order parameters such as client, project type, dates, and scope.

methods.name: buildTwoColDescriptionTable(title, leftText, rightHeader = "", rightValue = "")
methods.description: Builds a two-column table with a title, description, and optional right-side header and value for deliverables.

methods.name: buildMilestonesFinancials({ templateData = {}, currency })
methods.description: Builds a table displaying project milestones and financial totals.

methods.name: buildContinuationTable({ templateData = {} })
methods.description: Builds a table for additional, continuation items numbered 11 to 20.

methods.name: buildHeader({ meta = {}, templateData = {} })
methods.description: Constructs the document header, including a logo if provided.

methods.name: buildAuthorization({ templateData = {} })
methods.description: Creates signature blocks for supplier and client approvals, including images if provided.

methods.name: buildFooter()
methods.description: Builds an empty footer placeholder.

methods.name: buildSowDocx(data, templateSchema)
methods.description: Main exported function that assembles all sections and generates the DOCX blob.

methods.name: makeSowDocxFilename(data)
methods.description: Generates a filename based on metadata and current date for the SOW document.

methods.name: formatCurrency(val, currency = "USD")
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: formatDate(dateStr)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: labelCell(text, widthPct)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: makeCell( children, { widthPct, vAlign = VerticalAlign.TOP, padding = 200, opts = {} } = {} )
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: para( text, { bold = false, size = 21, align = AlignmentType.LEFT, after = 80 } = {} )
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: tableFullWidth(rows)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: toParagraphs(text, { size = 21, align = AlignmentType.LEFT } = {})
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: valueCell(text, widthPct)
methods.description: unavailable
